thread.title: Watch Treasury Secretary Mnuchin address the House Finance Committee

author: Kevin Breuninger
title: Watch Treasury Secretary Mnuchin address the House Finance Committee
text:
Watch: Treasury Secretary Mnuchin addresses House Finance Committee amid market whipsaw 2 Hours Ago Breaking News 
[The stream is slated to start at 10 a.m. ET. Please refresh the page if you do not see a player above at that time.] 
Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin is expected to testify before the House Financial Services Committee On Tuesday. 
The committee is holding a hearing on "The Annual Report of the Financial Stability Oversight Council," of which Mnuchin is the chairman. 
The hearing arrives amid a global market sell-off . On Monday, the Dow Jones industrial average saw the largest single-day point drop in U.S. history, falling more than 1,100 points and wiping out all gains from 2018. CNBC NEWSLETTERS
